properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of the legend.'bottom' - Below the chart.'top' - Above the chart.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Alignment of the legend.'start' - Aligned to the start of the area allocated for the legend.'center' - Centered in the area allocated for the legend 'end' - Aligned to the end of the area allocated for the legend.

properties.name: bold
properties.description: Set true for Legend text in bold

properties.name: max-lines
properties.description: Maximum number of lines in the legend. Set this to a number greater than one to add lines to your legend.
